summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 9875, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of King Street, between Fifth Avenue South and Sixth Avenue South; Sixth Avenue South, between King Street and Weller Street, and Weller Street, between Sixth Avenue South and Maynard Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by pilling, capping, planking and sidewalking the same, in accordance with Resolution of the City Council of the City of Seattle No. 694, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899."
